itineraryDays.title: Day 1

activities.name: Sunrise Boat Ride on the Ganges
activities.description: Witness the mesmerizing sunrise over the Ganges River. A serene experience to observe the morning rituals and ghats.

activities.name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
activities.description: Visit one of the most famous Hindu temples dedicated to Lord Shiva.

activities.name: Annapurna Temple
activities.description: Visit another important temple dedicated to the goddess of food, Annapurna.

activities.name: Lunch at Kashi Chat Bhandar
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Varanasi street food in a relatively sheltered environment.

activities.name: Dashashwamedh Ghat Evening Aarti
activities.description: Attend the spectacular Ganga Aarti ceremony at Dashashwamedh Ghat.

activities.name: Dinner at a local vegetarian restaurant
activities.description: Enjoy a traditional thali in a temperature-controlled restaurant.

itineraryDays.tips: Stay hydrated and carry water. Wear comfortable walking shoes.

itineraryDays.title: Day 2

activities.name: Sarnath Excursion
activities.description: Visit Sarnath, where Buddha gave his first sermon. Explore the Dhamek Stupa and Archaeological Museum.

activities.name: Bharat Kala Bhavan Museum (Banaras Hindu University)
activities.description: Explore a diverse collection of Indian art and archaeology within the Banaras Hindu University campus. Offers a cooler environment.

activities.name: Lunch at a restaurant near BHU
activities.description: Enjoy a meal at a restaurant near the Banaras Hindu University.

activities.name: Manikarnika Ghat (Cremation Ghat)
activities.description: Witness the Hindu cremation rituals at Manikarnika Ghat. (Note: This can be a sensitive experience).

activities.name: Shopping for Silk Sarees
activities.description: Explore the local markets for famous Banarasi silk sarees. Look for shops that offer a comfortable shopping environment.

activities.name: Dinner at a rooftop restaurant (if weather permits)
activities.description: Enjoy dinner at a rooftop restaurant with a view of the Ganges. Check weather conditions before.

itineraryDays.tips: Stay hydrated and carry water. Wear comfortable walking shoes.
